```{r setup}
library(testdown)
```

## Copy fake package
```{r}
tmppkg <- tempfile(pattern = "pkg-")
dir.create(tmppkg)
file.copy(
  system.file("fake.package", package = "testdown"), tmppkg,
  recursive = TRUE)
```

## Run `test_down` on package
```{r}
out.dir <- tempfile(pattern = "testdown-")
unlink(out.dir)
out <- test_down(
  pkg = file.path(tmppkg, "fake.package"),
  book_path = out.dir,
  open = FALSE
)
# browseURL(out)
```
